name: text-plugins
description: A collection of text-plugins which can be used to apply <span> tags and classes to text
author: Concord Consortium <developer@concord.org>

scripts.lerna:remove:usage:
echo 'Usage: npm run lerna:remove -- module-to-remove 
 cf. https://github.com/lerna/lerna/issues/833#issuecomment-396462481 
 cf. https://github.com/npm/npm/issues/9627#issuecomment-319449695 '
scripts.lerna:remove: bash -c 'lerna exec -- yarn remove "$0" || lerna bootstrap'
